```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(rotspot)
dat <- params$dat

n_pkgs <- length(unique(x$pkg))
```

# by author

```{r, fig.height=length(unique(x$author))}
  dd <- dat[, .(commits = length(unique(hash))), by = c("date", "author")]

  ggplot2::ggplot(
    dd,
    ggplot2::aes(
      x = date,
      y = commits    )
  ) +
    ggplot2::geom_bar(stat = "identity", color = "#B4DE2CFF") +
    ggplot2::theme_dark() +
    ggplot2::facet_grid(author ~ .)
```


# By package

```{r, fig.height=n_pkgs}
plot(dat) 
plot(dat) +
```
